ViewObject.Name: SlsInvVO
ViewObject.SelectList: SlsInvEO.CLD_ID, SlsInvEO.SLOC_ID, SlsInvEO.ORG_ID, SlsInvEO.HO_ORG_ID, SlsInvEO.DOC_ID, SlsInvEO.DOC_DT, SlsInvEO.CURR_RATE, SlsInvEO.INV_TYPE, SlsInvEO.EO_ID, SlsInvEO.INTIM_SLIP_ID, SlsInvEO.BILL_ADD, SlsInvEO.USR_ID_CREATE, SlsInvEO.USR_ID_CREATE_DT, SlsInvEO.USR_ID_MOD, SlsInvEO.USR_ID_MOD_DT, SlsInvEO.TOT_AMT_BS, SlsInvEO.TOT_AMT_SP, SlsInvEO.DISC_TYPE, SlsInvEO.DISC_VAL, SlsInvEO.TAX_AFTER_DISC_FLG, SlsInvEO.DISP_DOC_ID, SlsInvEO.CURR_ID_BS, SlsInvEO.CURR_ID_SP, SlsInvEO.TAX_RULE_FLG, SlsInvEO.COA_ID, SlsInvEO.INV_STAT, SlsInvEO.FY_ID, SlsInvEO.INV_MODE, SlsInvEO.EXT_DOC_DT, SlsInvEO.EXT_DOC_NO, SlsInvEO.REF_DOC_ID, SlsInvEO.REMARKS, SlsInvEO.TOT_ITM_AMT_GS_BS, SlsInvEO.TOT_ITM_AMT_GS_SP, SlsInvEO.INV_SUB_TYPE, SlsInvEO.LC_ID, SlsInvEO.PEND_LC_AMT, SlsInvEO.SALES_VOU_ID, SlsInvEO.REV_SALES_VOU_ID, SlsInvEO.INCL_SRVC_ITM, SlsInvEO.DRFT_INV_ID, SlsInvEO.TAX_FORM_TYP_ID, SlsInvEO.PRJ_ID, SlsInvEO.SHIP_TO_ADDS, SlsInvEO.SHIP_TO_NM, SlsInvEO.SUPPLI_OPER_TYPE

ViewAttribute.Name: DiscValueSp
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: DiscType == null ?0.00:(DiscType=='A' ? (DiscVal==null? 0.00 : DiscVal) : ((TaxAfterDiscFlg == null || TaxAfterDiscFlg == 'N' || TaxAfterDiscFlg == false)? (TransTotAmtSp*(DiscVal==null? 0 : DiscVal)/100) : (((TransTaxAmountSp == null ? 0 : TransTaxAmountSp) + TransTotAmtSp)*(DiscVal==null? 0 : DiscVal)/100)))

ViewAttribute.Name: TransAmtAfterTaxSp
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: TaxAfterDiscFlg == 'N' ? (TransTotAmtSpAfterDisc == null ? 0.00 :(TransTaxAmountSp == null ? 0.00 : TransTaxAmountSp)+TransTotAmtSpAfterDisc): (TransTotAmtSp == null ? 0.00 :(TransTaxAmountSp == null ? 0.00 : TransTaxAmountSp)+TransTotAmtSp - (DiscValueSp == null ? 0.00 : DiscValueSp))

ViewAttribute.Name: TransAmtAfterOcBs
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: TransAmtAfterOcSp == null ? (CurrRate == null ? 0.00 : CurrRate ) : (CurrRate == null ? 0.00 : CurrRate )*TransAmtAfterOcSp
